title: Introduction
description: Introduce the task of removing objects from an image in Photoshop and provide an overview of the main steps and techniques that will be covered in the tutorial.

original_subgoals.title: Introduction
original_subgoals.description: Introduce the tutorial and outline the main steps involved in removing objects from an image in Photoshop.

original_subgoals.title: Introduction
original_subgoals.description: Introduce the task of removing objects from an image in Photoshop and provide an overview of the techniques that will be covered.

title: Selection Methods
description: Demonstrate various selection tools and techniques to select the object or subject to be removed from the image, such as the Lasso tool, and adjust selection settings for optimal results.

original_subgoals.title: Selection Methods
original_subgoals.description: Demonstrate various selection tools and techniques to select the object or subject to be removed from the image.

original_subgoals.title: Select Object
original_subgoals.description: Demonstrate how to select the object to be removed using a selection tool, such as the Lasso tool, and adjust selection settings for optimal results.

title: Expand Selection
description: Explain how to expand the selection to ensure there is enough space around the object for a smooth removal.

original_subgoals.title: Expand Selection
original_subgoals.description: Explain how to expand the selection to ensure there is enough space around the object for a smooth removal.

title: Content Aware Fill
description: Show how to use the Content Aware Fill tool to automatically or manually fill the selected area with surrounding data.

original_subgoals.title: Content Aware Fill
original_subgoals.description: Show how to use the content aware fill tool to automatically or manually fill the selected area with surrounding data.

title: Generative Fill
description: Explain how to use the Generative Fill feature to replace the selected object with new content, and how to choose between different generated variations. Also, demonstrate how to remove additional objects using this technique.

original_subgoals.title: Apply Generative Fill
original_subgoals.description: Explain how to use the Generative Fill feature to replace the selected object with new content, and how to choose between different generated variations.

original_subgoals.title: Remove Additional Objects
original_subgoals.description: Show how to remove other objects in the image using the same Generative Fill technique, ensuring consistency in the process.

title: Touch Up Removals
description: Guide on how to touch up the image after object removal to ensure a seamless blend using tools like the Clone Stamp tool and the Remove tool for precision.

original_subgoals.title: Touch Up Removals
original_subgoals.description: Guide on how to touch up the image after object removal to ensure a seamless blend using tools like the clone stamp tool.

original_subgoals.title: Touch Up Image
original_subgoals.description: Guide on touching up smaller areas and fixing any issues created by the Generative Fill, using tools like the Remove tool for precision.

title: Restore Original Details
description: Detail the process of restoring specific parts of the image that were unintentionally altered, using selection and masking techniques.

original_subgoals.title: Restore Original Details
original_subgoals.description: Detail the process of restoring specific parts of the image that were unintentionally altered, using selection and masking techniques.

title: Final Adjustments
description: Perform final adjustments to ensure the image looks seamless, using a combination of selection, Generative Fill, and other tools as needed.

original_subgoals.title: Final Adjustments
original_subgoals.description: Perform final adjustments to ensure the image looks seamless, using a combination of selection, Generative Fill, and other tools as needed.

title: Conclusion
description: Conclude the tutorial by summarizing the process and encouraging viewers to explore further resources for enhancing their object removal skills in Photoshop.

original_subgoals.title: Conclusion
original_subgoals.description: Conclude the tutorial and encourage viewers to explore more content and keep creating.

original_subgoals.title: Conclusion
original_subgoals.description: Summarize the process and encourage viewers to explore further resources for enhancing their object removal skills in Photoshop.
